Level 9: Friar

(This level was numbered 6 in an [id://504121|older] level numbering system.)

This is the minimum level at which you may [id://17688|moderate] and [id://92975|consider].

It is also the level at which one becomes eligible for membership in [id://238736|groups] of the [Cabal], such as [SiteDocClan] and [pmdev].

As soon as you reach this level, you'll want to enable your [id://590076|Approval Nodelet].
(Go to your [id://25185] and enter a non-zero order number for this nodelet.)

You will now always see unmoderated content, regardless of your [href://?node_id=786919#misc|Miscellaneous Settings].

See also: [id://5938]

Back to the [PerlMonks FAQ]
